== About Me ==

I'm Leonor Hungria from Lisbon, Portugal. I have a degree in Linguistics and I'm a member of Ubuntu Portuguese Translators in proof-reading and translation. I've became interested in open source software not long ago and now I'm a XUbuntu user.
